entry.title: Goku Kids Rash Guard

Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Kids - Longsleeve
Price: 47.95

Channel your favorite Dragon Ball Z character with the Goku Kids Rash Guard. Feel your power level increase every time you train in this lightweight compression shirt. Designed to withstand even the most rigorous workout. Available in long sleeve and short sleeve traditional orange and blackout. Great as an MMA and BJJ rash guard, surfing, watersports, and a workout compression shirt for kids.

Why XMARTIAL Rash Guards:

  • Anti-slip gel panel technology for extra grip and keeping the rash guard from riding up.

  • Moist-wicking technology to keep away sweats.
  • Fully sublimated graphics that won't crack, peel, or fade over time and maintain a great look. 
  • Breathable, stretchy, and quick dry for maximum comfort. 
  • One-Year Warranty, we stand behind our product quality.
  • 100% Money-Back Guarantee, risk-free buy.

Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Kids - Longsleeve
Price: 45.00

Cast an eye around your gym while wearing Leopard Kids Rash Guard. Allows you to look wild and brave in a stylish compression shirt built with your comfort and training in mind. This rash guard is not just for jiu-jitsu! Works great as an MMA and BJJ rash guard, for surfing, watersports, and as a workout compression shirt for kids.

Why XMARTIAL Rash Guards:

  • Anti-slip gel panel technology for extra grip and keeping the rash guard from riding up.
  • Crafted with the finest fabrics to withstand the toughest training conditions. 
  • Moist-wicking technology to keep away sweats.
  • Fully sublimated graphics that won't crack, peel, or fade over time and maintain a great look. 
  • Breathable, stretchy, and quick dry for maximum comfort. 
  • One-Year Warranty, we stand behind our product quality.
  • 100% Money-Back Guarantee, risk-free buy.

    For Men 
    ➤ Leopard Rash Guard (Longsleeve)
    ➤ Leopard Rash Guard (Shortsleeve)
    ➤ Leopard BJJ/MMA Shorts
    ➤ Leopard Muay Thai Shorts
    ➤ Leopard BJJ/MMA Compression Shorts
    ➤     Leopard Fightwear Bundle
    ➤ Leopard Muay Thai Bundle

    For Women

entry.title: Graffiti Muay Thai Kids Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Muay Thai Bundle
Price: 149.95

Start your training off right with the Graffiti Muay Thai Kids Bundle. This bundle comes with 6 oz boxing gloves and a headgear so you have everything you need for a complete training session. 

Muay Thai 6OZ Gloves Features:

  • Made from high-quality premium materials making it durable and resilient
  • Achieve maximum breathability and comfort
  • Provides a secure fit that maintains protection and comfort for a variety of striking angles
  • Shock protecting foam to make these gloves reliable for greater safety.
  • The secure wrap strap closing supports your wrist from twisting and provides a good grip for an efficient training/ workout session.
  • Ideal for sparring & punch bag training. 
  • Size: 6oz
  • Applicable group: Children from 6 to 12 years old .

Muay Thai Headgear Features:

  • Material: Made of high-quality PU. The inner liner is made with soft a Non-slip material. Synthetic leather is lightweight, soft and comfortable, also water and sweat resistant and holds the headgear in place.
  • Design: Monkey face shape design, can protect your head during boxing training, ensures you stay secure against nasty cuts and blows to your face and provides enough peripheral vision
  • Full Coverage: Full coverage of the head, cheeks, and chin. Solid padding makes nice protection for nose, cheek and full-face. About 1 inches padding for protecting your head and reduce shock
  • Protection-Headgear for Muay Thai, Grappling, Sparring, Kickboxing, Karate, Martial Arts, Sanda, Fighting, Taekwondo and Karate.
